The movie is compatible with XBOX360/PS3(except cinavia)/Apple/whatever.
On PC i suggest using MediaPlayerClassic-HC***. VLC plays any kind of file you throw at it, but you'll get more decoding artifacts. For the best quality in VLC with HD material: preferences/show--settings:all/video/filters/disable all filters, especially post-processing filter.

***in MPC-HC options be sure to select atleast Enhanced Video Renderer or Video Mixing renderer 9. --in options/playback/output/DirectShow Video


***********************************************************************************
***********************************************************************************

To enjoy AC3 Dolby digital 5.1 you need to select the 2nd audio track in your player of choice, be sure to have your playback device set on 5.1 output, and connected to your receiver via S/PDIF or HDMI.

***********************************************************************************
***********************************************************************************


FLiCKSiCK releases have the goal to keep a good balance between video and audio quality at the smallest file size possible. There are already other teams delivering such deal, but to me they stress too much the filesize at the cost of quality, especially audio quality, so there we go. Enjoy.

Synopsis:
Posing as lovers on vacation, Motoko and Batou work to try to stop a terrorist organization whose symbol is the Scylla. Meanwhile, Togusa investigates a murder of a man who possessed a prosthetic leg manufactured by the Mermaid's Leg corporation.

Director:.....Kazuchika Kise

Writer:.......Masamune Shirow, Tow Ubukata

Music:........Keigo Oyamada (aka Cornelius)

Starring:
Maaya Sakamoto
